/usr/bin/c++    -w   CMakeFiles/pyramid.dir/pyramid.cc.o  -o pyramid -rdynamic -L/home/william/Package/0.3.x/0.3.2/zhockon.src/library -L/home/william/Package/0.3.x/0.3.2/zhockon.src/samples/pyramid/../../lib ../../library/libzhockon.so -Wl,-Bstatic -lSDLmain -Wl,-Bdynamic -lSDL -lpthread -lopenal -lalut -lglut -lGLU -Wl,-rpath,/home/william/Package/0.3.x/0.3.2/zhockon.src/library:/home/william/Package/0.3.x/0.3.2/zhockon.src/samples/pyramid/../../lib
